metadata.description: Specific use case workflows with predefined molecule compositions
metadata.purpose: Guide AI in creating molecules for specific business use cases

mmm_marketing_mix_modeling.name: MMM (Marketing Mix Modeling)
mmm_marketing_mix_modeling.description: Build marketing mix models to measure marketing effectiveness and ROI

molecules.purpose: Start with data upload and validation, followed by feature analysis. Understand your dataset to prepare for modeling.

atoms.purpose: Classify marketing spend columns, sales metrics, and external factors
Select relevant time periods, channels, and markets for modeling

molecules.purpose: Use auto-regressive models for price forecasting. Evaluate model performance to ensure accuracy.

atoms.purpose: Build marketing mix regression models with media variables
Compare models and select best performing MMM

molecules.purpose: Create multiple pricing scenarios using the scenario planner. Visualize outcomes with interactive charts.

atoms.purpose: Evaluate MMM accuracy, generate ROI metrics, attribution analysis

mmm_marketing_mix_modeling.business_value: Measure marketing effectiveness, optimize budget allocation, calculate ROAS per channel

customer_ltv_prediction.name: Customer Lifetime Value (LTV) Prediction
customer_ltv_prediction.description: Predict customer lifetime value for retention and targeting strategies

molecules.purpose: Start by loading customer and transaction data, then merge them together. Clean and prepare features for accurate predictions.

atoms.purpose: Join customer demographics with transaction history

molecules.purpose: Create calculated columns for recency, frequency, and monetary metrics. Aggregate customer behavior to identify high-value patterns.
Use regression models for LTV prediction and evaluate accuracy. Visualize segments with charts to optimize strategies.

customer_ltv_prediction.business_value: Identify high-value customers, optimize acquisition spend, reduce churn

demand_forecasting.name: Demand Forecasting
demand_forecasting.description: Forecast product demand for inventory and supply chain planning

molecules.purpose: Start with data upload and validation of historical sales data. Clean data and analyze patterns to understand trends.
Use trend analysis to detect seasonal patterns and trends. Calculate statistics to prepare for accurate forecasting.
Use auto-regressive models for demand forecasting. Evaluate performance and visualize forecasts with charts.

demand_forecasting.business_value: Optimize inventory levels, reduce stockouts, improve supply chain efficiency

price_elasticity_analysis.name: Price Elasticity Analysis
price_elasticity_analysis.description: Analyze how price changes affect demand and revenue

molecules.purpose: Start with loading pricing history and sales volume data. Merge them to create a unified dataset for analysis.
Create calculated columns for price and volume changes. Use regression to estimate elasticity coefficients by segment.

atoms.purpose: Calculate % price change and % volume change

molecules.purpose: Create multiple pricing scenarios using the scenario planner. Visualize outcomes with charts to optimize pricing.

price_elasticity_analysis.business_value: Optimize pricing strategy, maximize revenue, understand demand sensitivity

churn_prediction.name: Customer Churn Prediction
churn_prediction.description: Predict which customers are likely to churn

molecules.purpose: Connect to customer database and load activity data. Create churn indicators to identify at-risk customers.

atoms.purpose: Create churn indicators (days since last login, usage decline, etc.)

molecules.purpose: Use machine learning models to predict churn risk. Compare algorithms and build the best performing model.
Evaluate model accuracy and generate churn risk scores. Segment at-risk customers and visualize with charts.

churn_prediction.business_value: Reduce customer churn, target retention campaigns, improve customer satisfaction

sales_performance_dashboard.name: Sales Performance Dashboard

molecules.purpose: Connect to sales database and load transaction data. Combine regional data for unified KPI tracking.
Aggregate sales by region, product, and time period. Create custom columns for growth rates and trends.

atoms.purpose: Aggregate sales by region, product, time period
Calculate growth rates, targets vs actuals

molecules.purpose: Create interactive charts to visualize revenue and growth trends. Add executive summary insights for stakeholders.

sales_performance_dashboard.business_value: Monitor sales performance, identify opportunities, track against targets

ai_instructions.workflow_mode_behavior: In Workflow Mode, AI should suggest MOLECULE COMPOSITIONS (grouping atoms together), not execute agents directly
molecule_creation_guidelines: Group related atoms that work together for a specific sub-goal
Each molecule should have a clear purpose
Molecules connect sequentially to form complete workflow
First molecule usually handles data loading/preparation

example_conversation.user: I want to build an MMM model
example_conversation.ai_response:
I'll help you create a workflow for Marketing Mix Modeling. Here's how I suggest grouping the atoms into molecules:

**Molecule 1: Data Preparation & Feature Selection**
- data-upload-validate (upload marketing data)
- column-classifier (identify marketing channels and metrics)
- scope-selector (select modeling timeframe)

**Molecule 2: Model Building & Selection**
- build-model-feature-based (build MMM regression)
- select-models-feature (compare model variants)

**Molecule 3: Model Evaluation**
- evaluate-models-feature (assess accuracy and get marketing ROI)

Would you like me to create this workflow?

how_to_suggest_molecules: Look up matching use case in use_case_workflows.json
Present molecule compositions from the use case
Show how molecules connect in sequence
Ask user if they want to create this workflow
